cfg.name: xueqiu_by_symbol
cfg.table_extract_meta: <extract> <row exact="1"> <webctrl tag='article' class='timeline__item'/> </row> <column exact='1' name='full_text_url' attr='href' name2='publish_time' attr2='text'> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__main' /> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__info' /> <webctrl tag='a' class='date-and-source' /> </column> <column exact='1' name='title' attr='text'> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__main' /> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__bd' /> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__content timeline__item__content--longtext' /> <webctrl tag='h3' class='timeline__item__title' /> </column> <column exact='1' name='abstract' attr='text'> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__main' /> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__bd' /> <webctrl tag='div' class='timeline__item__content timeline__item__content--longtext' /> <webctrl tag='div' class='content content--description' /> <webctrl tag='div' idx='1'/> </column> </extract>
